name: Rezzard, the Desecrating Vampire
text:
Imperishable
When this card enters your field, you may puy up to two cards from your hand into your chant-standby area face down.
This card gains [+200/+200] for each card in your chant-standby area.
God's Art <March of Undead> BB4: Remove any number of resonators in your graveyard from the game. For each card removed this way, each player banishes a resonator and discards a card. (Play God's Art <March of Undead> only once per game.)
set: The Seven Kings of the Lands
